item.description:
Let's get together for a drink or two at the ideal location for commuters.

******THIS PLACE IS ACTUALLY IN THE SUBWAY STATION and NOT TO BE CONFUSED WITH THE OTHER CLARKES IN FANEUIL HALL********

Get there when you can. I will arrive at 4 and hang until about 7.
The first new member who finds me gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi
Catch up or meet up with new and familiar folks before you head home.

Here's Clarke's at SOUTH STATION

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Seated at the bar tables against the walls with the high stools....look for the deck of red playing cards on the table.
item.name: Pre Turkey Tuesday Happy Hour - November 23rd
